data.message: Do you guys even look at the messages people send you? How does anyone get help with a problem they're having?

replies.message: Hi Travis! I can help you here. What's going on? -Elissa
Can you send me a message? I'd really rather not do this in a comment section.
FACEBOOK!!  i need your help i have a problem with my facebook account why facebook see's me as a bot, please contact me if you see this message it's really important!
You don't get help.  It's a disgrace.  Facebook is not a nice place no matter how hard Mark Z. try's to pull it off.
still nothing. I just need someone to fix my daughter's account without having to send you photo ID cause that's not happening.
i rly need help i have problem with my profile.

Hi admin facebook Currently there are many people on facebook auto tag spam made us very uncomfortable and frustrating, there are pictures tagged sensitive, we are extremely angry. The following is the way they spam. Hopefully the CEO of facebook adjusted to fit This is the clip I turned back the way they spam bulk https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qg-nNTzYVLk&feature

Hi Travis. Unfortunately, we can't give you information about the account or take any action on the account at your request. If your daughter's account is disabled, she can submit an appeal here: http://on.fb.me/1uZi9Qf. If she continues to have a problem, she can send us a Private Message. Hope this helps! -Elissa
why the facebook see's my account fake as a bot please help.

facebook i am from  koh tao thailand i have a page but 49,000 up like i can't change the name you can make a new project let  6 mount you can change name let this O K i Sosadd i want chang name my page name YouShare 18+

You have suspended a disabled Native American veteran's page because you say his name is fake....AND you refuse to respond to him.  In this age of identity theft he is NOT sending you any government ID.  Why won't you respond when he emails you?
None of my inbox messages to Facebook have been answered and NOW  my photos won't upload and no one responded to my issues?
facebook:  Please close this Account  some one created  Fake Account https://www.facebook.com/people/Mohamed-Faslul/100006944561385
